description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: In BroadcastSystemMessage of servicemgr.cpp, there is a possible Remote Code Execution due to a use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

En BroadcastSystemMessage de servicemgr.cpp, existe una posible ejecución remota de código debido a un use after free. Esto podría conducir a una escalada local de privilegios sin necesidad de permisos de ejecución adicionales. La interacción del usuario no es necesaria para la explotación.
